channel.title: Chirp on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Chirp on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Chirp
item.description: Look at all this green. Like a wall. Like a fortress. Boxed in. So green. So close. And the chirps. Chipper-chirper. I count 5 birds. 2 here. 3 there. This one over here stops when I walk this way. This one over here stops when I listen too closely. Like an old-skool hunter. I read the Ether by chirp. Now I sing with my new friends. Mimic this one. I can do the tonality.
